name: Grand Chocolate Chai Cocktail

ingredients.name: Grand MarnierÂ® orange liqueur or Cointreau

preparation: Scald chocolate milk and sugar in a Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup.
Turn off heat, add chai tea leaves and steep to desired strength.
Strain, add liqueur, and froth in a frother.
Pour into 2 glasses. Serve warm and top with orange garnish.
tips: Make it a mocktail by omitting the liqueur.
